content: People really overrate the Sixers rebuild. Last I checked, they still suck. All these years of being an embarrassment, and all they have to show for it is two centers they can’t trade, another that in three years hasn’t shown the ability to stay on the court for more than 25 minutes, and a guy that was the first pick in what’s looking like a historically weak draft. The Wolves and Bucks, who didn’t tank nearly as egregiously, have much brighter futures.
